title: Download Link for Game is not working
body: I uninstalled my client hoping to reinstall it and fix the freezing issue I had with it previously but none of the download links i've gone to even work. Something hextechnically wrong indeed.

replies.body: We ran into some problems on the account creation page earlier, which affected the download link.  Should be resolved now, but let me know if you are still having troubles with the page
Yes it's working now. Thank you for all that you do :)

yeah I feel your pain should look at my thread about last patch working for a few hours logging out then launcher refusing to even open.......all steps I took are presented and now I cant even reinstall cause the link is broken
